inclusion.criterion: Chronic renal insufficiency as defined by the North American Pediatric Renal Transplant Cooperative Study (NAPRTCS; estimated creatinine clearance < 75 ml/min/1.73 m2 by the Schwartz formula)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Unable or unwilling to adhere to the protocol
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Additional diagnoses that could impair responsiveness to GH, e.g. dwarfism syndromes or significant extra-renal organ disease, e.g. chronic liver disease, diabetes mellitus, AIDS
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has Paget's Disease of Bone and is starting Bisphosphonate therapy.
